name: Deep Dreams (LuxeL, Nerdig Freak, Giulia Colombo, Claudio Francioso, Michele Piccolini, Diebanez)
name_original: Deep Dreams (LuxeL, Nerdig Freak, Giulia Colombo, Claudio Francioso, Michele Piccolini, Diebanez)
description:
Go deeper in your dreams in this little game released for the Ludum Dare 48! You play as the consciousness of the protagonist and your objective is to "anesthetize" your sleeping body shooting Z bullets at yourself! Dodge problems and anxieties while you try to find out what keeps you awake at night...

Will you reach the end and discover the truth?

Credits:

Ahmed Mohamed - 3d artist

Diego Cugno - programming

Claudio Francioso - audio, sound design

Giulia Colombo - cover image, visual

Luca Leonardi - design, programming

Michele Piccolini - design, programming

...and an anonymous guest star, that gave us a really big contribute with the project!
